segments.text: Mr . Crandall , I ’ m sorry , but I really don ’ t see the value in doing this entire project over from scratch . It would take a lot of work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s certainly true . But , that ’ s what this job is all about , Maria . There's no doubt that this project is unacceptable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree . But I think that we can handle the problem by making a few major changes . I ’ d appreciate it if you would give me a chance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , Maria . I ’ ll give you until tomorrow at 4:00 to produce a satisfactory piece of work , but otherwise , you ’ ll have to re-do it .
segments.speaker: S2
